OOC: Okay, I don't know why I was appointed Penguin 2, I don't mind
helping, but lets just say that the profile dosent tell me much about
how he acts, so I am sorry if this isnt quite how he is Tankor.

BIC:

Penguin 2 squawked, as the two rays of energy slammed into his torso,
and he tried to stand up to the force of the attack, but was thrust
backwards. He left his feet, and sailed across the floor on his rounded
back, skidding to a halt, as he tried to look through the smoke rising
off his chest. His beak opened again for a squawk, but this time three
bullets darted out, at a wild pace through the smoke.
